Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/Stony Island
ShortDescription: SB 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester, 71st and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near 71st/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester, 71st and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near 71st/Stony Island.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed Western
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Western due to a track condition. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Western due to a track condition.

Shuttle buses are available between Kimball and Southport to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#81 Lawrence

#78 Montrose

#80 Irving Park

#152 Addison

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
